page.title: 01THE KINNEFF AREA
page.content: {THE KINNEFF AREA}is in the North_East of Scotland along the coast between Aberdeen and Montrose. Kinneff is a small village with about 50 houses, a guesthouse,a shop,a hall and a church. The main coast road South from Aberdeen passes through the village. The{SCHOOL}is about half mile from the village and has a roll of 21 children with 2 teachers. { {TODHEAD LIGHTHOUSE}stands on the coast flashing its signal 29 miles out to sea. There are several ruins of old castles scattered down the coast. The old Kinneff village is nearer the sea and the{OLD KINNEFF CHURCH}still stands there. The Scottish Crown Jewels were hidden there at one time. We have lots of farms in our area. {SLAINS PARK FARM}is the biggest one.
